about_the_game:
Fisher Online - China. Henan Lake

The prototype for this lake was the beautiful Lake Xihu (literally "Western Lake") — the famous freshwater lake in the center of Hangzhou. Since the possibilities of the game do not allow us to convey all the beauty and size of the original lake, we invented a neighboring lake. Welcome to the "Southwest Ecological Henan Lake"

AI-map generation, 8 kilometers of coastline, 2.4 sq. km of water area, three game zones: channels, shallow waters, deep water.

29 species of inhabitants, of which 12 are found only at this location. Fans of float and bottom fishing will be able to catch koi carp of different colors, grass and silver carps, tilapia or mud carp. Spinningists may find it interesting to hunt for a large yellowcheek or auha-perch. Fly fishing enthusiasts will also not be left without prey, there is an interesting fish predatory carp.


The location is available after purchase for any level and at any time. After purchasing this DLC, you need to re-enter the game.

Fisher Online - China. Henan Lake

The prototype for this lake was the beautiful Lake Xihu (literally "Western Lake") — the famous freshwater lake in the center of Hangzhou. Since the possibilities of the game do not allow us to convey all the beauty and size of the original lake, we invented a neighboring lake. Welcome to the "Southwest Ecological Henan Lake"

AI-map generation, 8 kilometers of coastline, 2.4 sq. km of water area, three game zones: channels, shallow waters, deep water.

29 species of inhabitants, of which 12 are found only at this location. Fans of float and bottom fishing will be able to catch koi carp of different colors, grass and silver carps, tilapia or mud carp. Spinningists may find it interesting to hunt for a large yellowcheek or auha-perch. Fly fishing enthusiasts will also not be left without prey, there is an interesting fish predatory carp.

name: Fisher Online - China DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 10 Series
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 20 Series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
